name: Sofa
description: A sofa is a piece of furniture that a few people can comfortably sit on together. ... Sofas are typically upholstered, with a high back and arms.

name: Chair
description: A chair is a piece of furniture. It is used for sitting on and it can also be used for standing on, if you can't reach something. They usually have four legs to support the weight.

name: Book Shelf
description: A bookcase, or bookshelf, is a piece of furniture with horizontal, shelves, often in a cabinet, used to store books or other printed materials.

name: Computer Chair
description: In our html file we have several divs sharing the same class. Those are the different pages (or as they are called in SPA - states) our app can show
